data.textUthmani: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: يُسَبِّحُ [Glorifies] لِلَّهِ [[to] Allah] مَا [whatever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَمَا [and whatever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ [the earth] لَهُ [For Him] ٱلْمُلْكُ [(is the) dominion] وَلَهُ [and for Him] ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ [(is) the praise] وَهُوَ [And He] عَلَىٰ [(is) on] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] قَدِيرٌ [All-Powerful]
data.transliteration: Yusabbihu lillahi ma feeassamawati wama fee al-ardilahu almulku walahu alhamdu wahuwa AAala kullishay-in qadeer

data.textUthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: هُوَ [He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] خَلَقَكُمْ [created you] فَمِنكُمْ [and among you] كَافِرٌۭ [(is) a disbeliever] وَمِنكُم [and among you] مُّؤْمِنٌۭ ۚ [(is) a believer] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] بِمَا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do] بَصِيرٌ [(is) All-Seer]
data.transliteration: Huwa allathee khalaqakum faminkum kafirunwaminkum mu/minun wallahu bima taAAmaloonabaseer

data.textUthmani: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
data.wordByWord: خَلَقَ [He created] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضَ [and the earth] بِٱلْحَقِّ [with truth] وَصَوَّرَكُمْ [and He formed you] فَأَحْسَنَ [and made good] صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ [your forms] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] ٱلْمَصِيرُ [(is) the final return]
data.transliteration: Khalaqa assamawati wal-ardabilhaqqi wasawwarakum faahsana suwarakumwa-ilayhi almaseer

data.textUthmani: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
data.wordByWord: يَعْلَمُ [He knows] مَا [what] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَيَعْلَمُ [and He knows] مَا [what] تُسِرُّونَ [you conceal] وَمَا [and what] تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ [you declare] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] عَلِيمٌۢ [(is) All-Knowing] بِذَاتِ [of what] ٱلصُّدُورِ [(is in) the breasts]
data.transliteration: YaAAlamu ma fee assamawatiwal-ardi wayaAAlamu ma tusirroona wamatuAAlinoona wallahu AAaleemun bithati assudoor

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Has not] يَأْتِكُمْ [come to you] نَبَؤُا۟ [(the) news] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] مِن [from] قَبْلُ [before] فَذَاقُوا۟ [So they tasted] وَبَالَ [(the bad) consequence] أَمْرِهِمْ [(of) their affair] وَلَهُمْ [and for them] عَذَابٌ [(is) a punishment] أَلِيمٌۭ [painful]
data.transliteration: Alam ya/tikum nabao allatheena kafaroomin qablu fathaqoo wabala amrihim walahum AAathabunaleem

data.textUthmani: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرٌ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا۟ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ وَّٱسْتَغْنَى ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: ذَٰلِكَ [That] بِأَنَّهُۥ [(is) because] كَانَت [had] تَّأْتِيهِمْ [come to them] رُسُلُهُم [their Messengers] بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ [with clear proofs] فَقَالُوٓا۟ [but they said] أَبَشَرٌۭ [Shall human beings] يَهْدُونَنَا [guide us] فَكَفَرُوا۟ [So they disbelieved] وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ [and turned away] وَّٱسْتَغْنَى [And can do without them] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] غَنِىٌّ [(is) Self-sufficient] حَمِيدٌۭ [Praiseworthy]
data.transliteration: Thalika bi-annahu kanatta/teehim rusuluhum bilbayyinati faqalooabasharun yahdoonana fakafaroo watawallaw wastaghnaAllahu wallahu ghaniyyun hameed

data.textUthmani: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: زَعَمَ [Claim] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوٓا۟ [disbelieve] أَن [that] لَّن [never] يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ [will they be raised] قُلْ [Say] بَلَىٰ [Yes] وَرَبِّى [by my Lord] لَتُبْعَثُنَّ [surely you will be raised] ثُمَّ [then] لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ [surely you will be informed] بِمَا [of what] عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ [you did] وَذَٰلِكَ [And that] عَلَى [for] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] يَسِيرٌۭ [(is) easy]
data.transliteration: ZaAAama allatheena kafaroo an lanyubAAathoo qul bala warabbee latubAAathunna thummalatunabbaonna bima AAamiltum wathalika AAalaAllahi yaseer

data.textUthmani: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ [So believe] بِٱللَّهِ [in Allah] وَرَسُولِهِۦ [and His Messenger] وَٱلنُّورِ [and the Light] ٱلَّذِىٓ [which] أَنزَلْنَا ۚ [We have sent down] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] بِمَا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do] خَبِيرٌۭ [(is) All-Aware]
data.transliteration: Faaminoo billahiwarasoolihi wannoori allathee anzalna wallahubima taAAmaloona khabeer

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَجْمَعُكُمْ [He will assemble you] لِيَوْمِ [for (the) Day] ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ [(of) the Assembly] ذَٰلِكَ [that] يَوْمُ [(will be the) Day] ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ [(of) mutual loss and gain] وَمَن [And whoever] يُؤْمِنۢ [believes] بِٱللَّهِ [in Allah] وَيَعْمَلْ [and does] صَـٰلِحًۭا [righteous deeds] يُكَفِّرْ [He will remove] عَنْهُ [from him] سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ [his evil deeds] وَيُدْخِلْهُ [and He will admit him] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [(to) Gardens] تَجْرِى [flow] مِن [from] تَحْتِهَا [underneath it] ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ [the rivers] خَـٰلِدِينَ [abiding] فِيهَآ [therein] أَبَدًۭا ۚ [forever] ذَٰلِكَ [That] ٱلْفَوْزُ [(is) the success] ٱلْعَظِيمُ [the great]
data.transliteration: Yawma yajmaAAukum liyawmi aljamAAi thalikayawmu attaghabuni waman yu/min billahiwayaAAmal salihan yukaffir AAanhu sayyi-atihiwayudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtihaal-anharu khalideena feeha abadan thalikaalfawzu alAAatheem

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [But those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] وَكَذَّبُوا۟ [and denied] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ [[in] Our Verses] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [those] أَصْحَـٰبُ [(are the) companions] ٱلنَّارِ [(of) the Fire] خَـٰلِدِينَ [abiding forever] فِيهَا ۖ [therein] وَبِئْسَ [And wretched is] ٱلْمَصِيرُ [the destination]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboobi-ayatina ola-ika as-habuannari khalideena feeha wabi/sa almaseer

data.textUthmani: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: مَآ [Not] أَصَابَ [strikes] مِن [any] مُّصِيبَةٍ [disaster] إِلَّا [except] بِإِذْنِ [by (the) permission] ٱللَّهِ ۗ [(of) Allah] وَمَن [And whoever] يُؤْمِنۢ [believes] بِٱللَّهِ [in Allah] يَهْدِ [He guides] قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ [his heart] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] بِكُلِّ [of every] شَىْءٍ [thing] عَلِيمٌۭ [(is) All-Knowing]
data.transliteration: Ma asaba min museebatinilla bi-ithni Allahi waman yu/min billahiyahdi qalbahu wallahu bikulli shay-in AAaleem

data.textUthmani: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
data.wordByWord: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ [So obey] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَأَطِيعُوا۟ [and obey] ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ [the Messenger] فَإِن [but if] تَوَلَّيْتُمْ [you turn away] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] عَلَىٰ [upon] رَسُولِنَا [Our Messenger] ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ [(is) the conveyance] ٱلْمُبِينُ [clear]
data.transliteration: WaateeAAoo Allaha waateeAAooarrasoola fa-in tawallaytum fa-innama AAalarasoolina albalaghu almubeen

data.textUthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱللَّهُ [Allah] لَآ [(there is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ ۚ [Him] وَعَلَى [And upon] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ [let put (their) trust] ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ [the believers]
data.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa waAAala Allahi falyatawakkali almu/minoon

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا۟ وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلَّذِينَ [(you) who] ءَامَنُوٓا۟ [believe] إِنَّ [Indeed] مِنْ [from] أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ [your spouses] وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ [and your children] عَدُوًّۭا [(are) enemies] لَّكُمْ [to you] فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ [so beware of them] وَإِن [But if] تَعْفُوا۟ [you pardon] وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ [and overlook] وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ [and forgive] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] غَفُورٌۭ [(is) Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌ [Most Merciful]
data.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanooinna min azwajikum waawladikum AAaduwwan lakum fahtharoohumwa-in taAAfoo watasfahoo wataghfiroo fa-inna Allahaghafoorun raheem

data.textUthmani: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ [your wealth] وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ [and your children] فِتْنَةٌۭ ۚ [(are) a trial] وَٱللَّهُ [and Allah ] عِندَهُۥٓ [with Him] أَجْرٌ [(is) a reward] عَظِيمٌۭ [great]
data.transliteration: Innama amwalukum waawladukumfitnatun wallahu AAindahu ajrun AAatheem

data.textUthmani: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ [So fear] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] مَا [what] ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ [you are able] وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ [and listen] وَأَطِيعُوا۟ [and obey] وَأَنفِقُوا۟ [and spend] خَيْرًۭا [(it is) better] لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ [for yourselves] وَمَن [And whoever] يُوقَ [is saved] شُحَّ [(from the) greediness] نَفْسِهِۦ [(of) his soul] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ [(are) the successful ones]
data.transliteration: Fattaqoo Allaha maistataAAtum wasmaAAoo waateeAAoo waanfiqookhayran li-anfusikum waman yooqa shuhha nafsihi faola-ikahumu almuflihoon

data.textUthmani: إِن تُقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَـٰعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: إِن [If] تُقْرِضُوا۟ [you loan] ٱللَّهَ [(to) Allah] قَرْضًا [a loan] حَسَنًۭا [goodly] يُضَـٰعِفْهُ [He will multiply it] لَكُمْ [for you] وَيَغْفِرْ [and will forgive] لَكُمْ ۚ [you] وَٱللَّهُ [And Allah] شَكُورٌ [(is) Most Appreciative] حَلِيمٌ [Most Forbearing]
data.transliteration: In tuqridoo Allaha qardanhasanan yudaAAifhu lakum wayaghfir lakum wallahushakoorun haleem

data.wordByWord: عَـٰلِمُ [(The) Knower] ٱلْغَيْبِ [(of) the unseen] وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ [and the witnessed] ٱلْعَزِيزُ [the All-Mighty] ٱلْحَكِيمُ [the All-Wise]
